results.t: What is UTF-8 Encoding? A Guide for Non-Programmers
results.p: Apr 3, 2024 — UTF-8 is an encoding system for Unicode. It can translate any Unicode character to a matching unique binary string, and can also translate the ...
Unicode is a universal character set that defines all the characters needed for writing the majority of living languages in use on computers.

results.t: utf8 - Perl pragma to enable/disable UTF-8 ...
results.p: The use utf8 pragma tells the Perl parser to allow UTF-8 in the program text in the current lexical scope. The no utf8 pragma tells Perl to switch back to ...

results.t: Utf-8 Converter, Utf-8 Encoding and Decoder
results.p: Online Utf-8 converter, easy to use utf-8 encoding and decoder tool. Convert plain text to utf-8 codes and vice versa.
Package utf8 implements functions and constants to support text encoded in UTF-8. It includes functions to translate between runes and UTF-8 byte sequences.

results.t: 12.9.3 The utf8 Character Set (Deprecated alias for utf8mb3)
results.p: The utf8mb3 character set is deprecated. utf8mb3 remains supported for the lifetimes of the MySQL 8.0.x and MySQL 8.4.x LTS release series.
